author: pipermerriam
content:
Ideally we would like to get a team (either a client team, or a team working within a (fork of a) client's codebase) focused on figuring out "state expiry": https://ethresear.ch/t/resurrection-conflict-minimized-state-bounding-take-2/8739/17

The ideas I have for that are the offering of funding and a general call-to-action where we try to get broader visibility that there's a problem worth working on.

Unfortunately, I also know that in general, the people who have the knowledge and expertise to do this tend to already have a completely full "plate".

author: pipermerriam
content: I'd be curious to hear from any of the client teams out there what your thoughts are on this.  Are you interested?  What's standing in the way of you saying "yes"?
